attributes.action: Cancel GCSEs this year in England
attributes.additional_details: We are having to cover work from year 10 that we were not taught due to COVID 19. This means we have to do extra work either at home, without teacher support, or rush it in school missing potentially more work that could be vital to our GCSEs. More stress and anxiety of this extra work is not helpful and is causing some students to fall apart.
attributes.background: GCSEs should be cancelled due to the time wasted and extra pressure put on students.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
